name: brave-real-puppeteer-playwright-core

scripts.patch-both: npm run patch-puppeteer && npm run patch-playwright

scripts.setup-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright && echo üé™ Playwright-core setup completed with stealth patches!

scripts.install-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer
